categories: Category:Star Wars: The Clone Wars voice actors

nodes.text: Matthew Yang King (born May 6, 1974) is an American actor, voice actor, director, writer and producer. He is best known for his recurring roles in Riverdale, Powers, Strong Medicine and Numbers. He was cast as Nyx Okami in four episodes of Star Wars: The Clone Wars prior to the series' cancellation in 2013. In 2020, the episodes were completed as part of a seventh season, but the character of Okami was replaced with Trace and Rafa Martez.
